description: We recap all of the winners from last weekend's UTC events and talk about the events coming in the next few weeks.
title: UTC Weekend Recap and Preview: February 16, 2024

description: You have been haunted by nightmares for months; visions of indescribable horror. You scramble from your sodden bed, shrieking. Your good lady quips it is the late-night feasting that’s to blame. Perhaps one should not eat so well. It makes your stomach play tricks on your mind. But you feel no guilt at enjoying the […]
title: The Lore Explainer: Flesh Eater Courts

description: Stormbringer is a weekly hobby magazine from Hachette Partworks introducing players to Warhammer: Age of Sigmar. In this 80-week series, our intrepid magazine-receiver will be reviewing each individual issue, its included models, and gaming materials. A Premium US subscription was provided to Goonhammer for review purposes. If you want to follow along at home, US […]
title: SRM’s Ongoing Stormbringer Review: Week 13

description: As is their wont, Para Bellum INSIST on continuing to improve Conquest: the Last Argument of Kings and have just dropped a new rules update for the game. We talk about what changed and what it means.
title: Conquest Feb 2024 Update: the Goonhammer Hot Take
